QuestData.Title: The Silent Skull: The Third Reagent
QuestData.Description:
The final component of the elixir is a handful of Steamcap mushrooms. The journal reads:
"The Crowfeeder said that they grow among the steam vents in the higher parts of the Everbloom. I have seen one such place above the northern hydra pools."
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the clue from the journal to find the Steamcap Mushrooms.

Objectives.Objective: Follow the clue to find the Steamcap Mushrooms
